content.text: I'm a bit of an introvert. How about you?
I'm an extrovert! I love being around people and talking to them.
I wish I was more like you. I'm always so shy around new people.
I'm sure you're not as shy as you think.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great activities! I love to read too.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of genres, but I'm especially interested in historical fiction and thrillers.
I love historical fiction too! I've been reading a lot of books about the Civil War lately.
That sounds really interesting! I've never read any books about the Civil War.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
